Title: Samsung’s One UI 8 beta arrives on Galaxy S25 phones
Description:
Samsung has launched its beta test of One UI 8, the company’s customized take on Android 16.
The beta is available now on the Galaxy S25, Plus, and Ultra — though strangely not the new S25 Edge — for users in the US, UK, Germany, and South Korea.
Unsurprising…

Title: Apple’s DIY repair program now covers iPads
Description:
Apple is expanding its self-service repair program to cover a range of iPads, including mini, Air, and Pro models.
The program opens tomorrow, at which point you’ll be able to order spare parts and repair kits for the Apple tablets.
The program is mostly limi…

Title: Acefast made the RGB-enabled earbuds I've always wanted
Description:
With the AceFit Pro, Acefast is delivering one of the best open earbuds you can buy today.
The striking design combined with excellent sound quality makes these a great choice.

Title: Apple Card Savings Account's Interest Rate Lowered Again
Description:
The interest rate on Apple Card's savings account was today lowered from 3.75% to 3.65%—an all-time low.
The drop follows the last interest rate cut in March, where it reduced from 3.9% to 3.75%.
If you deposited $1,000 into the account, and maintained t…

Title: Word of the Week: How 'pride' shifted from vice to a symbol of LGBTQ empowerment
Description: The word pride has shifted over the millennia, from being first used to describe one of the seven deadly sins in Roman Catholic theology to becoming a global symbol for LGBTQ strength and empowerment.

Title: This beverage brand CEO says making his products in the US has been essential to his success
Description: When Cirkul's co-founders came up with a water-enhancing cartridge system, no one else knew how to make it — so they figured it out themselves.

Title: AI is advancing faster than data centers can keep up in Asia, says a Groq exec
Description: Ian Andrews, the chief revenue officer at Groq, said Asia is running into a very physical problem: not enough data centers and infrastructure.

Title: Intel Extreme Masters moves esports tournament from Katowice to Kraków, Poland
Description: ESL FaceIt Group, the esports company owned by Savvy Games Group, said the Intel Extreme Masters (IEM) esports tournament will move from Katowice to Kraków, Poland.

Title: An Extreme Cousin for Pluto? Possible Dwarf Planet at Solar System Edge
Description:
A small team led by Sihao Cheng, Martin A.
and Helen Chooljian Member in the Institute for Advanced Study’s School of Natural Sciences, has discovered an extraordinary trans-Neptunian object (TNO), named 2017 OF201, at the edge of our solar system.

Title: CheerpJ 4.1: Java in the browser, now supporting Java 17 (preview)
Description:
The latest release of our state-of-the-art Java runtime that runs completely in the browser via WebAssembly, is now available.
Supports up to Java 17.

Title: Apple Card Savings Account sees another interest rate cut
Description:
Apple Card Savings Account has taken another hit to its interest rate as of today.
Apple and Goldman Sachs have dropped the annual percentage yield from 3.75% to 3.65%, marking the second rate cut of 2025.
